apiKey.description: API key used by the cfollow client to identify to the server

crontab.description: When rtcwake is to occur configuration

defaultConnectionsCount.description: Default number of connections sent out in requests

defaultPositionsCount.description: Default number of positions sent out in requests

enableSendLog.description: Whether logs should be sent as an additional request

enableArchiveLogAfterSend.description: Whether logs should be archived after being sent. Default is true and the goal is to minimize request size
